north_star.title: From Punk Rock to Spiritual Warrior
north_star.why_it_matters: Raghunath Cappo's journey from a punk rock icon to a spiritual leader showcases the transformative power of seeking deeper meaning in life. His story inspires many to pursue their spiritual paths, regardless of their past.

north_star.title: Champion of Clean Living and Bhakti Yoga
north_star.why_it_matters: Cappo's advocacy for clean living, vegetarianism, and Bhakti yoga resonates with contemporary movements towards health and spirituality, making him a relevant figure in today's wellness culture.

north_star.title: Kirtan Leader and Yoga Educator
north_star.why_it_matters: As a kirtan leader and educator, Raghunath Cappo bridges ancient wisdom with modern practices, fostering a community that values spiritual growth and connection through music and yoga.
